profile.name: Owali Ullah Shawon
profile.aboutDescription: Developed specialized skills via years of exposure in various locations and endeavour to be the greatest connection between the analyst and the technologist. Would like to work on a project topic and make a significant contribution to the area of computing science. When it comes to addressing difficulties swiftly and effectively, I am most inspired and passionate, and I am eager to take the next important step in my career.
